definitions: a touring show of performers, especially pop musicians

examples.text: witness the last great rock 'n' roll band demolish an entire city with their million-decibel roadshow

definitions: a touring political or promotional campaign

examples.text: the bank is planning a European and American roadshow
Clinton's roadshow had the breezy feel of a candidate on a victory lap

definitions: a radio or television program broadcast on location, especially each of a series done from different venues.
shortDefinitions: each of series of radio or television programmes broadcast on location from different venues
